citation.abstract: Studies in cancer patients with venous thromboembolism suggested that low molecular weight heparin may prolong survival. In a double-blind study, we evaluated the effect of low molecular weight heparin on survival in patients with advanced malignancy without venous thromboembolism.
citation.publisher: Department of Internal Medicine II, Technical University of Munich, Munich, Germany. stefan_ruckert@yahoo.de
citation.title: The Effect of Low Molecular Weight Heparin on Survival in Patients With Advanced Malignancy
